Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Actuality \Ac`tu*al"i*ty\, n.; pl. {Actualities}. The state of being actual; reality; as, the actuality of God's nature. --South. [1913 Webster]
actuality n : the state of actually existing objectively; "a hope that progressed from possibility to actuality"
